name: Midas Miner Speed
summary: In this Speed version, you only have one minute to get the highest score possible. Switch the jewels and increase your multiplier by making big combinations. Colour bombs, explosions and the Last Blast are other features of this frantic game.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 益智
  • 游玩人数: 单人
  • 官方网站: http://www.king.com/games/puzzle-games/miner-speed
